TAM Segera Pasarkan Toyota Prius PHEV, Harga di Bawah Rp 1 Miliar
04 Nov 2019, 01:26 by Bisnis.com, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Toyota-Astra Motor (TAM) masih menunggu restu principal untuk memperkenalkan Toyota Prius plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV). Toyota memperkirakan harga kendaraan hybrid akan berada di bawah Rp1 miliar.
Direktur Pemasaran PT Toyota-Astra Motor (TAM) Anton Jimmy Suwandi mengatakan Toyota Prius PHEV telah diperkenalkan pada GIIAS 2019 dan mendapat sambutan positif dari konsumen. Sayangnya, hingga November 2019, TAM belum mendapatkan konfirmasi dari principal Toyota untuk memasarkan produk tersebut.
“Tapi sampai sekarang, sampai November awal ini pun kami belum dapat konfirmasi final dari pihak principal. Jadi, kami masih diskusi dan berharap segera mendapatkan jawaban. Mudah-mudahan tahun ini,” ujarnya, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Anton menjelaskan untuk memperkenalkan model baru TAM harus mendapatkan restu dari principal. Untuk model PHEV, restu dari principal itu lebih lama karena tidak hanya satu divisi tetapi beberapa divisi guna memastikan layanan purnajual yang baik.
Apalagi, model PHEV belum pernah diperkenalkan Toyota di Indonesia sehingga jika nanti diperkenalkan Prius PHEV akan menjadi kendaraan PHEV pertama Toyota di Indonesia. Menurutnya, jika tidak mendapatkan restu pada tahun ini, Prius PHEV diharapkan dapat diperkenalkan pada awal tahun depan.
“Untuk harga Toyota Prius PHEV kira-kira di bawah Rp1 miliar,” ujar dia.

TAM Immediately Market Toyota Prius PHEV, Prices Below Rp 1 Billion
Nov 04 2019, 01:26 by Bisnis.com, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Toyota-Astra Motor (TAM) is still waiting for the approval of the principal to introduce the Toyota Prius plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV). Toyota estimates that the price of hybrid vehicles will be under Rp1 billion.
PT Toyota-Astra Motor (TAM) Marketing Director Anton Jimmy Suwandi said the Toyota Prius PHEV had been introduced at GIIAS 2019 and received positive response from consumers. Unfortunately, until November 2019, TAM has not received confirmation from Toyota's principal to market the product.
"But until now, even until early November, we have not been able to get final confirmation from the principal. So, we are still discussing and hoping to get an answer soon. Hopefully this year, "he said, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Anton explained that to introduce a new model TAM must get the blessing from the principal. For the PHEV model, the blessing of the principal is longer because not only one division but several divisions to ensure good after-sales service.
Moreover, the Toyota PHEV model has never been introduced in Indonesia so that if later introduced the Prius PHEV will be Toyota's first PHEV vehicle in Indonesia. According to him, if it does not get approval this year, the Prius PHEV is expected to be introduced early next year.
"For the price of the Toyota Prius PHEV, it is approximately under Rp1 billion," he said.
